Name: Zoning, Belmont Osborn Rezoning, Brooklyn (C 220438 ZMK)
Title: Application number C 220438 ZMK (Belmont Osborn Rezoning) submitted by Osborn Belmont Properties, LLC, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 17d, eliminating from within an existing R6 District a C1-3 District, changing from an R6 District to an R7A District, changing from a C4-3 District to an R7A District, and establishing within the proposed R7A District a C2-4 District, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 16, Council District 41.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Land Use
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Subcommittee on Zoning and Franchises
